key_risks: Economic Sensitivity: Revenue tied to automotive and industrial sectors, vulnerable to downturns.
Supply Chain Disruptions: Ongoing risks from global supply chain issues affecting production and delivery.
Franchisee Dependence: Reliance on franchise network introduces financial and operational risks.
Competitive Pressures: Intense competition from established manufacturers and low-cost alternatives.
Environmental Concerns: Scrutiny over waste management and carbon emissions.
environmental_issues: Environmental impact from manufacturing processes, including waste management and carbon emissions.

sources.title: Environment | Snap-on Incorporated
sources.snippet: In 2008, Snap-on began voluntarily quantifying and reporting greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions to the Carbon Disclosure Project (CDP) on an annual basis.
